Articles.Content:
The Action Group tools are missing some things that one can do in the GUI.

So far, I've located:

"Toggle fuel crossfeed" on docking ports

"Lock fuel" on tanks

Are there any others missing?
A ton are missing, but most are like rename vessel, which is missing for obvious reasons.
I support an option to lock tanks with an action group.

this is kind of related, but RCS thrusters "toggle" function cannot be removed from the RCS action group.

I want to be able to make two RCS systems one for mono prop, during docking and one for Vernor Engines, during launch and re-entry.
